content: a crochet square with a sweet little heart in the center thanks to the surrounding chain spaces it has a lovely vintage inspired look this easy and fun pattern is perfect for beginners and uses only basic stitches you can use any yarn for this square this pdf pattern is available as an instant download finished dimensions 7 x 7 / 18 x 18 cm hook size 8mm yarn used lion brand wool-ease for the solid versions cotton yarn scraps for the rainbow versions any yarn can be used for this square **pdf pattern details ** written instructions in english us terms includes photo tutorial for visual guidance features a graph for the square a video tutorial is available on youtube - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - questions & returns there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - **please note ** this is a crochet pattern not a finished item please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog wilmade by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - **find me on social media** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
